ISSUE.TITLE: Date format in NopMigrationAttribute should allow 24 hour format
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 Steps to reproduce the problem: All date formats of NopMigrationAttribute are using 12 hour format without any "t" private static readonly string[] _dateFormats = { "yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss", "yyyy.MM.dd hh:mm:ss", "yyyy/MM/dd hh:mm:ss", "yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss:fffffff", "yyyy.MM.dd hh:mm:ss:fffffff", "yyyy/MM/dd hh:mm:ss:fffffff" }; Please consider using HH or t to avoid any confusion

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #4615 Changed date format to use 24-hour format on NopMigrationAttribute
#4615 Fixed problem with versions of migration in DB
